popular.title: Dyslexia support
popular.description: Change the font of the page. Apply OpenDyslexic and 15 plus different fonts to any web page.

popular.title: Text to Speech
popular.description: Turn text into lifelike natural speech. Helperbird can read aloud the content of any web pages, ebooks and pdfs with natural sounding voices.

popular.title: Reader Mode
popular.description: Reader Mode removes ads and distractions from any webpage with complete customization.

popular.title: PDF support
popular.description: Use immersive reader, text to speech and more on PDF files.

popular.title: Dyslexia Ruler
popular.description: Our Dyslexia ruler helps to follow the text on the screen easier and block out distracting content. It can be any colour to improve the accessibility of the text your reading.

popular.title: Immersive Reader
popular.description: Select text, right-click, and Microsoft's Immersive Reader will help you read it. Including Google docs, Pdfs & ebooks.

features.title: Reader Mode
features.description: Reader Mode removes ads and distractions from any webpage with complete customization.

features.title: Dyslexia Fonts
features.description: Change the font of the page. Apply OpenDyslexic and 15 plus different fonts to any web page.

features.title: Dyslexia Ruler
features.description: Our Dyslexia ruler helps to follow the text on the screen easier and block out distracting content. It can be any colour to improve the accessibility of the text your reading.

features.title: Highlighter
features.description: Highlight any paragraph or text on a website. Any colour you want. Super handy for studying and revision. Pdf support is coming next month.

features.title: Styles & Themes
features.description: Change background, highlight & font colors to help with focus and improve reading.

features.title: Overlays
features.description: A colour overlay is available to help those with Irlen Syndrome or those who dislike a web page's base colour but don't want to change it entirely.

features.title: Color blindness
features.description: Color blindness features including Emphasize Links and stroke text

features.title: Dictionary
features.description: Quickly look up word definitions with audio pronunciation as you browse the web, including synonyms, Etymology and related words.

features.title: Privacy
features.description: We never sell, store, or consume any user data. We do not store data or any other user-related content.

features.title: Text to Speech
features.description: Turn text into lifelike natural speech. Helperbird can read aloud the content of any web pages, ebooks and pdfs with natural sounding voices.

features.title: Voice typing
features.description: Type text using your voice. Speak using your voice, and it will be typed into a notepad where you can edit it.

features.title: Notes
features.description: Save and manage snippets of text, images, websites and videos using the notes feature.

features.title: Cognitive Load
features.description: Using granular colours that underline text, users can find reading more comfortable and fun.

features.title: Translate any page
features.description: Translate any website or any snippet of text with Helperbird. Over 100 languages, all with one click.

features.title: Screenshot
features.description: Take screenshots in your browser the easy way. Screenshot any page your viewing. All in one click.

features.title: Page & text magnifier
features.description: Page & text magnifier allows you to manage zoom options more precisely.

features.title: Cursor control
features.description: Make your mouse pointer more visible. Customize mouse cursor with sizes.

features.title: Immersive Reader
features.description: Select text, right-click, and Microsoft's Immersive Reader will help you read it. Including Google docs, Pdfs & ebooks.

features.title: Adjust letters and words
features.description: Adjust letter and word spacing, font size and line-height according to your needs.

features.title: Full document editor
features.description: Create, edit and delete documents in a full editor. Export and import to Google docs, Markdown and more.

features.title: PDF support
features.description: Use immersive reader, text to speech and more on PDF files.

features.title: Google docs support
features.description: Change fonts, immersive reader, text to speech and more on any Google docs file.

features.title: Extract text from images. (OCR)
features.description: A powerful optical character recognition (OCR) extension to capture and convert images, videos, Pdf's  to text.

features.title: Read it later
features.description: Helperbirds Bookmark Manager that helps with Organization, Syncing across browsers and platforms.

features.title: Annotate web pages
features.description: Highlight or annotate web pages documents, pdfs, ebooks and more content to improve engagement and study.

features.title: Analyze
features.description: Quickly find the number of characters, letters and breakdowns of all sentences on a webpage.

features.title: Reading guide
features.description: Reading ruler, useful when you are reading long texts on the web.

features.title: Line Focus
features.description: Quickly find the number of characters, letters and breakdowns of all sentences on a webpage.

features.title: Shortcuts
features.description: Access Helperbird features with keyboard shortcuts.

features.title: Summarize
features.description: Helperbird automatically summarizes the web page into bullet points.
